Uses of Message in gmi
 

Methods in gmi with parameters of type Message
 void GroupProxy.getUpdateView(Message msg)
          this method multicast the message to get the update view of all the running servers at that time.

 void GroupProxy.sendMessagetoServer(java.lang.String receiver, Message obj)
          This method sends the anycast message to receiver which is one of the member of servergroup.
